titles.title: Honoring and thanking John Thomas Caulfield for a life-long professional commitment to public service and for his years of dedicated service on behalf of the United States Capitol Police, the Capitol Police Board, and the Congress.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on House Administration.

bill.summary: 2/12/2007--Introduced. Honors, and extends the sincere appreciation of the House of Representatives to, John Thomas Caulfield and his family for a life-long professional commitment to public service and for his years of dedicated service on behalf of the U.S. Capitol Police, the Capitol Police Board, and Congress.
